column4: UPDATE 1-Schlumberger to invest $390 mln in Argentina's Vaca Muerta
column5: BUENOS AIRES  April 12 Argentina's state-run oil company YPF SA and Schlumberger AG  the world's top oil services provider  have reached a deal to invest $390 million in the Vaca Muerta shale formation  the companies said on Wednesday.

column4: Argentina's YPF  Schlumberger reach deal to invest $390 mln in Vaca Muerta
column5: BUENOS AIRES  April 12 Argentina's state-run oil company YPF SA and Schlumberger AG  the world's top oil services provider  have reached a deal to invest $390 million in the Vaca Muerta shale field in Patagonia  YPF said on Wednesday.
